name: SE2-06 — BEHIND THE CASCADE
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Cascade Waterfall (east interior, Mahé). Step behind the veil; water hides what stone declares.
Coins of light pay passage west.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: carved tick equals bearing; coin alignment gives direction.
properties.clue:
Step behind the veil; water hides what stone declares.
Coins of light pay passage west.
properties.visual_description: Water curtain; carved mark behind; coin sparkles in spray; skull emblem faint on wet rock; gloved hand reaches behind the fall.
